sentences.sContent: The mother was crooning a lullaby to her baby.
sentences.sContent_eng: The mother was crooning a lullaby to her baby.
sentences.sCn: 母亲正对着婴儿哼着摇篮曲。

sentences.sContent: The mother was crooning a lullaby to her baby.
sentences.sContent_eng: The mother was crooning a lullaby to her baby.
sentences.sCn: 母亲正对婴儿哼着摇篮曲。

sentences.sContent: The lullaby had the baby into the land of Nod in no time.
sentences.sContent_eng: The lullaby had the baby into the land of Nod in no time.
sentences.sCn: 催眠曲一下子就把婴儿送入了睡乡。

trans.tranOther: a slow quiet song sung to children to make them go to sleep
